OOC: Ya!! KitKat's back!!!!  I guess you could say I'm sort of a fan, lol! =
;)
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Logo morph 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogr=
oups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, March 17, 2001 9:48 PM
  Subject: KITKAT'S BACK=
!!&seeing double


  ::Sqizzy::
  She double checked her figures and starte=
d to revive the bot inside the 
  chamber.  She stood back as the chamber o=
pened and out came a black wolf.  
  The bot then transformed into bot mode=
 and looked around. "Predacon Leader 
  KitKat2, statis, functional." KitKa=
t shook her head. "Wha, where am I? And 
  how'd I get here?"
  Squizzy smi=
led. "Ah, your the one they had me cl...erhm..fix up. How are you 
  feelin=
g?"
  KitKat looked at the mongoose bot and smiled. "You fixed me up? I tha=
nk you. 
  Now please, I must return to my troops. Tell your leader that he=
 will have 
  the appreciation of the PACK and can count on us for support =
in the future."
  Squizzy opened her commlink. "Zardus, she's awake and rea=
dy to go."
  KitKat looked at Squizzy and noticed the name that the mongoos=
e had spoke. 
  KitKat said, "Zardus? I know that name. But from where?" sh=
e muttered.


  ::DarkMouse::
  She turned up the power to the tank and wai=
ted for the process to finish.  
  The tank opened and out stepped the blac=
k wolf bot.  The bot transformed 
  into bot mode. The bot was KitKat.  Dar=
kMouse smiled,"AH, KitKat, great to 
  have you back among the functional b=
ots. How ya feelin'?"
  KitKat looked at DarkMouse. "Wha? Oh, DarkMouse. Wh=
at happened?"
  DarkMouse started to tell KitKat about her assasination and=
 how she was 
  cloned and brought back.
  KitKat looked around,"And what h=
appened to Drillbit? If you've been asleep 
  for that long and I've been i=
n that tank, then how can I find out who's left 
  of our Pack and how do w=
e get them together again?"
  DarkMouse sighed,"That I'm not sure about my =
leader. But for now, You must 
  meet the new leader of the Predacons. And =
who knows, you may take your place 
  back as leader."
  KitKat shook her h=
ead,"I may take my place as leader, but without troops, 
  it's no use bein=
g a leader. What's a leader without someone to lead? No 
  DarkMouse. I'll =
not lead untill it's the right time. That's how I became 
  leader in the f=
irst place.  I let the other leader get killed, then I took 
  his place. B=
esides, I am worried about Drillbit. Have you heard form him?"
  DarkMouse =
shook her head. "Not yet, but I'm awaiting a call back."
